attributes.action: Please Boris Johnson apologise for "Humbug" remark to a frightened female MP.
attributes.background:
Paula Smith Mp had received death threats which quoted the prime minister's words, "surrender act".
 "We should not resort to offensive, dangerous or inflammatory language for legislation that we don't agree with.
Mr Johnson said: "I have to say, I've never heard such humbug in all my life."

rejection.details: This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister, rather than the responsibility of the Government or Parliament as a whole.
